name: Primates, not Inmates: The Great Escape
name_original: Primates, not Inmates: The Great Escape
description:
Made for BrackeysJam2021.1

Pikmin-inspired sort of puzzle game, with an endless survival mode at the end.

Left click is to attack, but I didn't have enough time to put it in the tutorial.

Notes: 

  • for the BIG KEY, you must click the center of it to make monkeys move it.
  • if your monkeys are stuck, bump into them to unstuck them.
  • Still stuck? space to recall, and right click again to send a different monkey
  • monkeys prioritize following lion over fighting

Credits:

Jordan - Programming, Art, Audio

Katrina - Art

Yong - Art

Nicolas - Art, Audio

Paolo - Programming, Art (UI Design)

Kiano - Audio (Monkey)
